txt.en: 'You must be [placeholder]. I have been awaiting your arrival and I am very excited to see that our letter found you well. I am Blossom Proudfoot and I am pleased to make your acquaintance. \n\n'I am here to help you through the very first stages of learning a craft. If you have any questions, feel free to ask me.'

'It seems you are a little ways from home, [placeholder]. No matter.\n\n'I am here to provide you with information and assistance in becoming a crafter, a very important role for many of the folk in Middle-earth.'

'You must be [placeholder]. I have been awaiting your arrival and I am very excited to see that our letter found you well. I am Jill Brushwood and I am pleased to make your acquaintance. \n\n'I am here to help you through the very first stages of learning a craft. If you have any questions, feel free to ask me.'
The Masters and Mistresses of Apprentices, representing the many Craft Guilds of Middle-earth, have invited you to speak with them about the many professions that they teach.

[placeholder],

The Crafting Guilds of Middle-earth thank you for all that you have done for the Free Peoples and would like to extend an invitation to speak with our representative, #-1:[placeholder]#-1:{Jill Brushwood, at the Craft Hall in the village of Combe[U]|Jill Brushwood, at the Craft Hall in the village of Combe[B]|Blossom Proudfoot at the Crafting Area in Michel Delving[O]|Loftur in the Crafting Hall at Thorin's Gate or Mor贸r at the Maker's Hall in Thorin's Hall[D]|Golphedinir at the Crafter's Terrace in Celondim[L]}.

We acknowledge your ability as a combatant and invite you to try your hand at a less violent form of work, craftsmanship. You will find that #-2:[placeholder]#-2:{Jill Brushwood is an able teacher|Blossom Proudfoot is an able teacher[O]|Loftur and Mor贸r are able teachers[D]|Golphedinir is an able teacher[L]} who can introduce you to pursuits ranging from cooking to scholarly to smithy and everything in between.

Sincerely,

The Crafting Guilds of Middle-earth

#-1:[placeholder]You received a letter from the Crafting Guilds of Middle-earth inviting you to visit one of their apprentice trainers. You should seek out #-1:{Jill Brushwood at the Craft Hall in Combe|Blossom Proudfoot at the Crafting Area in Michel Delving[O]|Golphedinir at the Crafter's Terrace in Celondim[L]|Loftur in the Crafting Hall at Thorin's Gate or Mor贸r at the Maker's Hall in Thorin's Hall[D]}.
